custom_css: @media (max-width: 767px) {.bls__grid {display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-between; } .bls__grid > .bls__product-load {width: 48%; margin-bottom: 10px; box-sizing: border-box; }}
.btn-filter {background-color: #43d5b0; color: black; border-color: #43d5b0; font-size: 15px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 1px 3px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.24) 0px 1px 2px;}
